name: hazard-spike-trap
description: Deadly floor spikes in retro pixel art style. Sharp metallic spikes pointing upward from ground, inspired by classic Mega Man instant-death hazards. Should look dangerous and clearly hazardous. Can have both up and retracted states. 16x16 pixels per tile, metallic gray with dark shadows.
gameStyle: retro pixel art platformer, Mega Man inspired, 16-bit style

specifications.behavior: instant death on contact, can be stationary or pop up/down
